sources.title: The Hottie & the Nottie | Full Romantic Comedy Movie | Paris Hilton | Christine Lakin
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

The Hottie & the Nottie - Nate moves to L.A. to track down Cristabel, the woman he's been in love with since childhood, only to discover that his plan to woo her only has one hurdle to overcome: what to do with June, Cristabel's ever-present, not-so-hot best friend? What's even more complicating is Nate's growing feelings for June, whose true beauty starts to emerge.

2008
Stars: Paris Hilton, Joel David Moore, Christine Lakin

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
